snippet.title: Atlus USA Trailer:  Disgaea: Hour of  Darkness
snippet.description:
Disgaea is a unique strategy RPG set in the demon-infested netherworld.  Awoken after two years of sleep, Prince Laharl learns that his father, King Krichevskoy, has died and that the kingdom is now in full-scale civil war for power.  Laharl, as the rightful heir to the throne, is not about to give up his birthright without a fight!

For more information, visit:
http://www.atlus.com/dis
